Name: The Chaos March
Details: The aptly named Chaos March was formed from remnants of the Terran Hegemony following the dissolution of the first Star League. Many worlds of the Chaos March were reorganized into the Sarna March of the Federated Commonwealth following the Fourth Succession War, only to be reconquered by the Capellan Confederation in 3057 during the joint Marik-Liao Operation Guerrero.
